channel.title: Help
channel.description: Ok... i want to know how to like make the shop pop up when u clik on the npc it's an npc that i added btw it wasn't already part of one of the shop npcs... but i added it to spawn.cfg or w/e and also to the other files and folders where i typed the case and everything and i also added it to shops too... but when i click it it doesnt do anything.... oh and i also need to know how to make it so that the items in the hops actually let u buy em and show a price when u value... instead of "0 points" please help... :(

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @whogoesthere whogoesthere
item.description:
@whogoesthere wrote:

Ok… i want to know how to like make the shop pop up when u clik on the npc it’s an npc that i added btw it wasn’t already part of one of the shop npcs… but i added it to spawn.cfg or w/e and also to the other files and folders where i typed the case and everything and i also added it to shops too… but when i click it it doesnt do anything… oh and i also need to know how to make it so that the items in the hops actually let u buy em and show a price when u value… instead of “0 points” please help…

Read full topic
